verses.verse: In the first<WH2298> year<WH8140> of Belshazzar<WH1113> king<WH4430> of Babylon<WH895> Daniel<WH1841> had<WH2370> a dream<WH2493> and visions<WH2376> of his head<WH7217> on his bed:<WH4903> then<WH116> he wrote<WH3790> the dream,<WH2493> and told<WH560> the sum<WH7217> of the matters.<WH4406>

Daniel<WH1841> spoke<WH6032> and said,<WH560> I saw<WH2370> in my vision<WH2376> by night,<WH3916> and, behold,<WH718> the four<WH703> winds<WH7308> of the heaven<WH8065> strove<WH1519> on the great<WH7227> sea.<WH3221>
And four<WH703> great<WH7260> beasts<WH2423> came<WH5559> up from the sea,<WH3221> diverse<WH8133> one<WH1668> from another.<WH1668>

The first<WH6933> was like a lion,<WH738> and had eagle's<WH5403> wings:<WH1611> I beheld<WH2370> <WH934> till<WH5704> the wings<WH1611> thereof were plucked,<WH4804> and it was lifted<WH5191> up from the earth,<WH772> and made stand<WH6966> on the feet<WH7271> as a man,<WH606> and a man's<WH606> heart<WH3825> was given<WH3052> to it.

And behold<WH718> another<WH317> beast,<WH2423> a second,<WH8578> like<WH1821> to a bear,<WH1678> and it raised<WH6966> up itself on one<WH2298> side,<WH7859> and it had three<WH8532> ribs<WH5967> in the mouth<WH6433> of it between<WH997> the teeth<WH8128> of it: and they said<WH560> thus<WH3652> to it, Arise,<WH6966> devour<WH399> much<WH7690> flesh.<WH1321>

After<WH870> this<WH1836> I beheld,<WH2370> <WH934> and see<WH718> another,<WH317> like a leopard,<WH5245> which<WH1768> had on the back<WH1355> of it four<WH703> wings<WH1611> of a fowl;<WH5776> the beast<WH2423> had also four<WH703> heads;<WH7217> and dominion<WH7985> was given<WH3052> to it.

After<WH870> this<WH1836> I saw<WH2370> in the night<WH3916> visions,<WH2376> and behold<WH718> a fourth<WH7244> beast,<WH2423> dreadful<WH1763> and terrible,<WH574> and strong<WH8624> exceedingly;<WH3493> and it had great<WH7260> iron<WH6523> teeth:<WH8128> it devoured<WH399> and broke<WH1855> in pieces, and stamped<WH7512> the residue<WH7606> with the feet<WH7271> of it: and it was diverse<WH8133> from all<WH3606> the beasts<WH2423> that were before<WH6925> it; and it had ten<WH6235> horns.<WH7162>

I considered<WH7920> the horns,<WH7162> and, behold,<WH431> there came<WH5559> up among<WH997> them another<WH317> little<WH2192> horn,<WH7162> before<WH6925> whom there were three<WH8532> of the first<WH6933> horns<WH7162> plucked<WH6132> up by the roots:<WH6132> and, behold,<WH431> in this<WH1668> horn<WH7162> were eyes<WH5870> like the eyes<WH5870> of man,<WH606> and a mouth<WH6433> speaking<WH4449> great<WH7260> things.

I beheld<WH2370> <WH934> till<WH5704> the thrones<WH3764> were cast<WH7412> down, and the Ancient<WH6268> of days<WH3118> did sit,<WH3488> whose garment<WH3831> was white as snow,<WH8517> and the hair<WH8177> of his head<WH7217> like the pure<WH5343> wool:<WH6015> his throne<WH3764> was like the fiery<WH5135> flame,<WH7631> and his wheels<WH1535> as burning<WH1815> fire.<WH5135>

A fiery<WH5135> stream<WH5103> issued<WH5047> and came<WH5312> forth<WH5312> from before<WH6925> him: thousand<WH506> thousands<WH506> ministered<WH8120> to him, and ten<WH7240> thousand<WH7240> times ten<WH7240> thousand<WH7240> stood<WH6966> before<WH6925> him: the judgment<WH1780> was set,<WH3488> and the books<WH5609> were opened.<WH6606>

I beheld<WH2370> <WH934> then<WH116> because<WH4481> of the voice<WH7032> of the great<WH7260> words<WH4406> which<WH1768> the horn<WH7162> spoke:<WH4449> I beheld<WH2370> <WH934> even<WH5705> till<WH5704> the beast<WH2423> was slain,<WH6992> and his body<WH1655> destroyed,<WH7> and given<WH3052> to the burning<WH3346> flame.<WH785>

As concerning the rest<WH7606> of the beasts,<WH2423> they had their dominion<WH7985> taken<WH5709> away:<WH5709> yet their lives<WH2417> were prolonged<WH754> <WH3052> for a season<WH2166> and time.<WH5732>

I saw<WH2370> in the night<WH3916> visions,<WH2376> and, behold,<WH718> one like the Son<WH1247> of man<WH606> came<WH858> <WH1934> with the clouds<WH6050> of heaven,<WH8065> and came<WH4291> to the Ancient<WH6268> of days,<WH3118> and they brought<WH7127> him near<WH7127> before<WH6925> him.

And there was given<WH3052> him dominion,<WH7985> and glory,<WH3367> and a kingdom,<WH4437> that all<WH3606> people,<WH5972> nations,<WH524> and languages,<WH3961> should serve<WH6399> him: his dominion<WH7985> is an everlasting<WH5957> dominion,<WH7985> which<WH1768> shall not pass<WH5709> away,<WH5709> and his kingdom<WH4437> that which<WH1768> shall not be destroyed.<WH2255>
I Daniel<WH1841> was grieved<WH3735> in my spirit<WH7308> in the middle<WH1459> of my body,<WH5085> and the visions<WH2376> of my head<WH7217> troubled<WH927> me.

I came<WH7127> near<WH7127> to one<WH2298> of them that stood<WH6966> by, and asked<WH1156> him the truth<WH3330> of all<WH3606> this.<WH1836> So he told<WH560> me, and made me know<WH3046> the interpretation<WH6591> of the things.<WH4406>
These<WH459> great<WH7260> beasts,<WH2423> which<WH1768> are four,<WH703> are four<WH703> kings,<WH4430> which shall arise<WH6966> out of the earth.<WH772>

But the saints<WH6922> of the most<WH5946> High<WH5946> shall take<WH6902> the kingdom,<WH4437> and possess<WH2631> the kingdom<WH4437> for ever,<WH5957> even<WH5705> for ever<WH5957> and ever.<WH5957>

Then<WH116> I would<WH6634> know<WH3046> the truth<WH3321> of the fourth<WH7244> beast,<WH2423> which<WH1768> was diverse<WH8133> from all<WH3606> the others, exceeding<WH3493> dreadful,<WH1763> whose<WH1768> teeth<WH8128> were of iron,<WH6523> and his nails<WH2953> of brass;<WH5174> which devoured,<WH399> broke<WH1855> in pieces, and stamped<WH7512> the residue<WH7606> with his feet;<WH7271>

And of the ten<WH6236> horns<WH7162> that were in his head,<WH7217> and of the other<WH317> which<WH1768> came<WH5559> up, and before<WH4481> <WH6925> whom<WH4479> three<WH8532> fell;<WH5308> even of that horn<WH7162> that had eyes,<WH5870> and a mouth<WH6433> that spoke<WH4449> very<WH7260> great<WH7260> things, whose look<WH2376> was more<WH5750> stout<WH7229> than<WH4481> his fellows.<WH2273>
I beheld,<WH2370> <WH934> and the same<WH1797> horn<WH7162> made<WH5648> war<WH7129> with the saints,<WH6922> and prevailed<WH3202> against them;

Until<WH5704> the Ancient<WH6268> of days<WH3118> came,<WH858> and judgment<WH1780> was given<WH3052> to the saints<WH6922> of the most<WH5946> High;<WH5946> and the time<WH2166> came<WH4291> that the saints<WH6922> possessed<WH2631> the kingdom.<WH4437>

Thus<WH3652> he said,<WH560> The fourth<WH7244> beast<WH2423> shall be the fourth<WH7244> kingdom<WH4437> on earth,<WH772> which<WH1768> shall be diverse<WH8133> from all<WH3606> kingdoms,<WH4437> and shall devour<WH399> the whole<WH3606> earth,<WH772> and shall tread<WH1759> it down, and break<WH1854> it in pieces.

And the ten<WH6236> horns<WH7162> out of this kingdom<WH4437> are ten<WH6236> kings<WH4430> that shall arise:<WH6966> and another<WH321> shall rise<WH6966> after<WH311> them; and he shall be diverse<WH8133> from the first,<WH6933> and he shall subdue<WH8214> three<WH8532> kings.<WH4430>

And he shall speak<WH4449> great words<WH4406> against<WH6655> the most<WH5943> High,<WH5943> and shall wear<WH1080> out the saints<WH6922> of the most<WH5946> High,<WH5946> and think<WH5452> to change<WH8133> times<WH2166> and laws:<WH1882> and they shall be given<WH3052> into his hand<WH3028> until<WH5704> a time<WH5732> and times<WH5732> and the dividing<WH6387> of time.<WH5732>
But the judgment<WH1780> shall sit,<WH3488> and they shall take<WH5709> away<WH5709> his dominion,<WH7985> to consume<WH8046> and to destroy<WH7> it to the end.<WH5491>

And the kingdom<WH4437> and dominion,<WH7985> and the greatness<WH7238> of the kingdom<WH4437> under<WH8460> the whole<WH3606> heaven,<WH8065> shall be given<WH3052> to the people<WH5972> of the saints<WH6922> of the most<WH5945> High,<WH5946> whose kingdom<WH4437> is an everlasting<WH5957> kingdom,<WH4437> and all<WH3606> dominions<WH7985> shall serve<WH6399> and obey<WH8086> him.

Till now<WH5705> <WH3542> is the end<WH5491> of the matter.<WH4406> As for me Daniel,<WH1841> my cogitations<WH7476> much<WH7690> troubled<WH927> me, and my countenance<WH2122> changed<WH8133> in me: but I kept<WH5202> the matter<WH4406> in my heart.<WH3821>
